attributes.action: To introduce legislation to Outlaw any UKTV channels being subscription only,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The output of the UKTV channels are predominantly BBC productions and therefore have already been paid for by the television licence. This I firmly believe to be morally wrong and socially unjust. Why should anyone have to pay subscriptions for shows that been broadcast on the BBC and therefore covered by the television license.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
